attributes.additional_details:
To change the way people are able to vote – in effect each person of voting age in the UK may vote for one of the nominated parties.
Labour
Conservative
Liberal
Ukip
I propose to have another voting option included which would be no political party.
The reason for this is it would give the Population the opportunity to  choose not to have politicians in government  ,thereby forcing the political parties to work on behalf of the population of Britain and their best interests .This would ensure only the parties working for the peoples interests would be voted in  - the people demand to have their interests  represented fairly ,not the interests of big business or those of other competing governments  . thus we the people could control politicians .
This should be rolled out in central and local elections to promote fairness to the populous
